categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Luudrian Star was a modified Ghtroc Class 720 freighter owned by Tru'eb Cholakk, Rebel gunrunner. Tru'eb was able to buy the ship with the reward he got from Platt Okeefe after freeing her from the slaver Big Quince.
In the Adventure Journal 2, the Luudrian Star is mistakenly identified as a Ghtroc Class 729 freighter.
